channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fahmy: Need Forceful Diplomacy, Not Force
Elon Musk’s stunning three-word reaction to SpaceX Starship exploding in fireball
I'm a former Amazon developer. Jassy's memo doesn't surprise me, and I don't think engineers should worry about their jobs.
Kenyan court sentences two men to 30 years in prison for aiding 2019 hotel attack
We need to take the cost and complexity out of going electric to supercharge EVs
Rebuilding one of the nation's oldest Black churches to begin at Juneteenth ceremony
item.description: A groundbreaking is scheduled in Virginia for the rebuilding of one of the nation’s oldest Black churches

item.title: Hundreds gather to remember slain Minnesota lawmaker and husband
item.description: Hundreds have gathered outside Minnesota’s Capitol for a vigil to remember a prominent state lawmaker and her husband gunned down at their home

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Wednesday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Wednesday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 23-29-50-64-67, Powerball: 11

item.title: 2 men get life sentences in shooting death of 11-year-old outside stadium
item.description: Two men have been sentenced to lifelong terms in prison in the shooting death of an 11-year-old boy outside an Albuquerque baseball stadium in 2023 th...

item.title: Global shares decline as tensions simmer in the Middle East
item.description: Shares have retreated in Europe and Asia as worries persist about conflict in the Middle East
